solution_line_template: Half of the book means {total_pages} / {half_divisor} = <<{total_pages}/{half_divisor}={half_pages}>>{half_pages} pages.
Reading the first half took Jane {half_pages} / {speed_first_half} = <<{half_pages}/{speed_first_half}={days_first_half}>>{days_first_half} days.
Reading the second half of the book took Jane {half_pages} / {speed_second_half} = <<{half_pages}/{speed_second_half}={days_second_half}>>{days_second_half} days.
So in total Jane needed {days_first_half} + {days_second_half} = <<{days_first_half}+{days_second_half}={total_days}>>{total_days} days to read the whole book.
